Name: Why are so Many NoSQL Databases Getting Hacked?

Metadata.title: Why are so Many NoSQL Databases Getting Hacked? | RavenDB

SeoMetaProperties.description: Over 100,000 MongoDB databases have been hijacked. Hackers have also raided servers hosting data on ElasticSearch, Apache CouchDB, and Hadoop. What's going on?
